mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vod_rt_cook( regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, type, cook_title_a, cook_title_b, cook_parts, cook_parts_main, cook_parts_sub, cook_type_a, cook_type_b, cook_chef_a, cook_chef_b, cook_kor_area_a, cook_kor_area_b, cook_oth_area_a, cook_oth_area_b, cook_place_name, cook_place_kor_area_a, cook_place_kor_area_b, cook_place_oth_area_a, cook_place_oth_area_b, cook_good_season, cook_good_day, cook_purpose, cook_flavor, cook_cooker, cook_shoot_place, cook_level_a, cook_level_b, cook_level_c, cook_time, cook_nutrient, cook_ea, cook_etc_a, cook_etc_b ) VALUES( #{regweek}, #{stat}, #{title}, #{part}, #{assetid}, #{type}, #{cook_title_a}, #{cook_title_b}, #{cook_parts}, #{cook_parts_main}, #{cook_parts_sub}, #{cook_type_a}, #{cook_type_b}, #{cook_chef_a}, #{cook_chef_b}, #{cook_kor_area_a}, #{cook_kor_area_b}, #{cook_oth_area_a}, #{cook_oth_area_b}, #{cook_place_name}, #{cook_place_kor_area_a}, #{cook_place_kor_area_b}, #{cook_place_oth_area_a}, #{cook_place_oth_area_b}, #{cook_good_season}, #{cook_good_day}, #{cook_purpose}, #{cook_flavor}, #{cook_cooker}, #{cook_shoot_place}, #{cook_level_a}, #{cook_level_b}, #{cook_level_c}, #{cook_time}, #{cook_nutrient}, #{cook_ea}, #{cook_etc_a}, #{cook_etc_b} )

INSERT INTO vod_rt_curr( regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, curr_subject, curr_person, curr_incident, curr_product, curr_process, curr_type, curr_mc, curr_actor, curr_keyword, cur_etc ) VALUES( #{regweek}, #{stat}, #{title}, #{part}, #{assetid}, #{curr_subject}, #{curr_person}, #{curr_incident}, #{curr_product}, #{curr_process}, #{curr_type}, #{curr_mc}, #{curr_actor}, #{curr_keyword}, #{cur_etc} )

INSERT INTO vod_rt_docu( regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, docu_subject, docu_person, docu_incident, docu_area, docu_mc, docu_actor, docu_keyword, docu_etc ) VALUES( #{regweek}, #{stat}, #{title}, #{part}, #{assetid}, #{docu_subject}, #{docu_person}, #{docu_incident}, #{docu_area}, #{docu_mc}, #{docu_actor}, #{docu_keyword}, #{docu_etc} )

INSERT INTO vod_rt_heal( regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, heal_subject, heal_part, heal_symtoms, heal_cause_a, heal_cause_b, heal_cause_c, heal_diagnose, heal_treat_type, heal_prevention, heal_drug, heal_treat_name, heal_hospital, heal_doctor, heal_talker, heal_actor, heal_expert, heal_public, heal_course, heal_activity, heal_ingredient, heal_food_a, heal_food_b, heal_activity_part, heal_activity_name, heal_season, heal_target, heal_keyword, heal_etc ) VALUES( #{regweek}, #{stat}, #{title}, #{part}, #{assetid}, #{heal_subject}, #{heal_part}, #{heal_symtoms}, #{heal_cause_a}, #{heal_cause_b}, #{heal_cause_c}, #{heal_diagnose}, #{heal_treat_type}, #{heal_prevention}, #{heal_drug}, #{heal_treat_name}, #{heal_hospital}, #{heal_doctor}, #{heal_talker}, #{heal_actor}, #{heal_expert}, #{heal_public}, #{heal_course}, #{heal_activity}, #{heal_ingredient}, #{heal_food_a}, #{heal_food_b}, #{heal_activity_part}, #{heal_activity_name}, #{heal_season}, #{heal_target}, #{heal_keyword}, #{heal_etc} )

INSERT INTO vod_rt_hist( regweek, stat, program, title, assetid, hist_subject, hist_area_a, hist_area_b, hist_year_a, hist_year_b, hist_person, hist_feat, hist_incident, hist_thing, hist_area_c, hist_actor, hist_etc ) VALUES( #{regweek}, #{stat}, #{program}, #{title}, #{assetid}, #{hist_subject}, #{hist_area_a}, #{hist_area_b}, #{hist_year_a}, #{hist_year_b}, #{hist_person}, #{hist_feat}, #{hist_incident}, #{hist_thing}, #{hist_area_c}, #{hist_actor}, #{hist_etc} )

INSERT INTO vod_rt_tour( regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, type, tour_theme, tour_area_a, tour_area_b, tour_area_c, tour_area_d, tour_area_e, tour_natural, tour_nation, tour_person, tour_festival, tour_type_a, tour_type_b, tour_type_c, tour_season, tour_human, tour_tourist, tour_mc_yn, tour_mc, tour_food, tour_type_d, tour_festival_name, tour_trans, tour_peaple, tour_weather, tour_music, tour_period, tour_companion, tour_etc_a, tour_etc_b ) VALUES( #{regweek}, #{stat}, #{title}, #{part}, #{assetid}, #{type}, #{tour_theme}, #{tour_area_a}, #{tour_area_b}, #{tour_area_c}, #{tour_area_d}, #{tour_area_e}, #{tour_natural}, #{tour_nation}, #{tour_person}, #{tour_festival}, #{tour_type_a}, #{tour_type_b}, #{tour_type_c}, #{tour_season}, #{tour_human}, #{tour_tourist}, #{tour_mc_yn}, #{tour_mc}, #{tour_food}, #{tour_type_d}, #{tour_festival_name}, #{tour_trans}, #{tour_peaple}, #{tour_weather}, #{tour_music}, #{tour_period}, #{tour_companion}, #{tour_etc_a}, #{tour_etc_b} )
mapper.select: SELECT idx, regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, type, cook_title_a, cook_title_b, cook_parts, cook_parts_main, cook_parts_sub, cook_type_a, cook_type_b, cook_chef_a, cook_chef_b, cook_kor_area_a, cook_kor_area_b, cook_oth_area_a, cook_oth_area_b, cook_place_name, cook_place_kor_area_a, cook_place_kor_area_b, cook_place_oth_area_a, cook_place_oth_area_b, cook_good_season, cook_good_day, cook_purpose, cook_flavor, cook_cooker, cook_shoot_place, cook_level_a, cook_level_b, cook_level_c, cook_time, cook_nutrient, cook_ea, cook_etc_a, cook_etc_b FROM vod_rt_cook
SELECT idx, regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, curr_subject, curr_person, curr_incident, curr_product, curr_process, curr_type, curr_mc, curr_actor, curr_keyword, cur_etc FROM vod_rt_curr
SELECT idx, regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, docu_subject, docu_person, docu_incident, docu_area, docu_mc, docu_actor, docu_keyword, docu_etc FROM vod_rt_docu

SELECT idx, regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, heal_subject, heal_part, heal_symtoms, heal_cause_a, heal_cause_b, heal_cause_c, heal_diagnose, heal_treat_type, heal_prevention, heal_drug, heal_treat_name, heal_hospital, heal_doctor, heal_talker, heal_actor, heal_expert, heal_public, heal_course, heal_activity, heal_ingredient, heal_food_a, heal_food_b, heal_activity_part, heal_activity_name, heal_season, heal_target, heal_keyword, heal_etc FROM vod_rt_heal

SELECT idx, regweek, stat, program, title, assetid, hist_subject, hist_area_a, hist_area_b, hist_year_a, hist_year_b, hist_person, hist_feat, hist_incident, hist_thing, hist_area_c, hist_actor, hist_etc FROM vod_rt_hist

SELECT idx, regweek, stat, title, part, assetid, type, tour_theme, tour_area_a, tour_area_b, tour_area_c, tour_area_d, tour_area_e, tour_natural, tour_nation, tour_person, tour_festival, tour_type_a, tour_type_b, tour_type_c, tour_season, tour_human, tour_tourist, tour_mc_yn, tour_mc, tour_food, tour_type_d, tour_festival_name, tour_trans, tour_peaple, tour_weather, tour_music, tour_period, tour_companion, tour_etc_a, tour_etc_b FROM vod_rt_tour
